thread.section_title: BlogPress Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BlogPress | theblogpress.com
thread.title: Austin Belshay

author: Austin Belshay
title: Austin Belshay
text:
Over the last ten years I have attempted to work with at least 12 different website designers, hosting companies and others to get several websites that I have online improved. All of those attempts ended in disappointment in one form or another. They over promised and under delivered.
Jennifer at BlogPress is incredible. She has exceeded my expectations in every regard. I feel like I ask too much but she has fulfilled every request, sometimes within minutes. If this continues to completion of this website project I will be moving my other website to BlogPress and I will be hoping that I get Jennifer on those projects as well.
